attributes.action: Ban Birmingham City Fans from blaming an apparent gypsies curse for being the reason they never achieve any success
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's face it, have you ever heard anything so patently ridiculous?  The reason they have had no success is that they are are rubbish!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
